content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Electricity generator at position(-1.5, 4.5)
Consists of 
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 1.5)
- Steam engine at position(-1.5, 4.5)
- Pipe group connecting offshore pump to boiler and boiler to steam engine
- Small electric poles connecting steam engine to electric mining drill at position(15.5, -0.5)

#### Coal mine at position(15.5, -0.5)
Consists of 
- Electric mining drill at position(15.5, -0.5)
- Wooden chest at position(15.5, 1.5) to collect coal

#### Crude oil extraction and processing at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of 
- Pumpjack at position(17.5, 40.5)
- Storage tank at position(22.5, 42.5)
- Pipe group connecting pumpjack to storage tank
- Oil refinery at position(28.5, 45.5)
- Small electric poles connecting steam engine to pumpjack and oil refinery

### ERROR TIPS
- Errors when placing entities too far away from the player position
  - Make sure to move to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum distance allowed is 10 units.
- Errors when electric mining drill is not receiving electricity
  - Ensure that the electric mining drill is connected to a power source and that the power source is functioning.
- Errors when boiler is out of fuel
  - Ensure that the boiler is supplied with fuel (e.g., coal) to continue functioning.
- Errors when attempting to place an entity at an occupied position
  - Ensure that the target location is not occupied by another entity or part of the terrain is not unplaceable (e.g., water).
- Errors when attempting to connect an empty storage tank to an oil refinery
  - Ensure that the storage tank has the required fluid (e.g., crude oil) before attempting to connect it to an oil refinery.
- Errors when inspecting the inventory of an entity
  - Ensure that the entity has an inventory and that it is properly initialized before attempting to inspect it.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
